column2: Nice to meet you! My name is Sophia, I am a nun at the church here.$I hope you like our village!$It's small, but it has its charm.
Are you mocking me? Are you trying to make me feel bad?
Thanks for the thought, but I don't really like this...
Oh this is neat! Thank you!
!!!! Praise the Goddess, this is exactly what I wanted!
Oh you saw my message? Thank you!

column3: I always pray to the goddess every morning.
It feels good to know the goddess is watching over us, don't you think?
